entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9544] Zwiększenie (zmniejszenie) stanu środków pieniężnych i ich ekwiwalentów przed skutkami zmian kursów wymiany with a value of 174,700,000 is not equal to the combined total of Przepływy pieniężne z działalności operacyjnej (wykorzystane w działalności operacyjnej), Przepływy pieniężne z działalności inwestycyjnej (wykorzystane w działalności inwestycyjnej) and Przepływy pieniężne z działalności finansowej (wykorzystane w działalności finansowej) ( 353,400,000 + -24,700,000 + -153,600,000 ) with a value of 175,100,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalentsBeforeEffectOfExchangeRateChanges fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of Zwiększenie (zmniejszenie) stanu środków pieniężnych i ich ekwiwalentów przed skutkami zmian kursów wymiany : -5 Decimals of Przepływy pieniężne z działalności operacyjnej (wykorzystane w działalności operacyjnej) : -5 Decimals of Przepływy pieniężne z działalności inwestycyjnej (wykorzystane w działalności inwestycyjnej) : -5 Decimals of Przepływy pieniężne z działalności finansowej (wykorzystane w działalności finansowej) : -5
Rule Element Id:9544 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/259400IUQZHB2GOLIV25/2020-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/259400IUQZHB2GOLIV25-2020-12-31.zip/259400IUQZHB2GOLIV25-2020-12-31/reports/259400IUQZHB2GOLIV25-2020-12-31.xhtml 5890

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Statement of Cash Flows, indirect method but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. amica:IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferences, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities, amica:ReceiptsFromContractsHeldForDealingOrTradingPurposes, ifrs-full:OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAccountPayable, ifrs-full:OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAccountReceivable, ifrs-full:CashReceiptsFromFutureContractsForwardContractsOptionContractsAndSwapContractsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForUnrealisedForeignExchangeLossesGains, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForProvisions, ifrs-full:OtherAdjustmentsForWhichCashEffectsAreInvestingOrFinancingCashFlow, ifrs-full:PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, amica:InflowsFromDebtFactoring, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:CashAdvancesAndLoansMadeToOtherPartiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories, ifrs-full:InterestPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:CashReceiptsFromRepaymentOfAdvancesAndLoansMadeToOtherPartiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromGovernmentGrantsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, amica:IssueOfSharesFromTheMotivationProgram, amica:ExpensesDueToDebtFactoring, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForSharebasedPayments, ifrs-full:DividendsPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromIssuingOtherEquityInstruments, ifrs-full:PaymentsOfOtherEquityInstruments, ifrs-full:PaymentsOfLeaseLiabilitiesClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForReconcileProfitLoss, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the extension abstracts SupplementalCashFlowInformationAbstract, CashFlowNoncashInvestingAndFinancingActivitiesDisclosureAbstract, NoncashInvestingAndFinancingItemsAbstract, NonCashOperatingAndFinancingActivitiesAbstract, NonCashOperatingAndInvestingActivitiesAbstract, NoncashFinancingItemsAbstract or NoncashInvestingItemsAbstract.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Statement of financial position, current/non-current but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:Goodwill, ifrs-full:CurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:OtherLongtermProvisions, ifrs-full:CurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits, ifrs-full:TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivables, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxLiabilitiesCurrent, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent, ifrs-full:InvestmentProperty, ifrs-full:Inventories, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:CurrentAssets, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxLiabilities, ifrs-full:OtherShorttermProvisions, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentNonfinancialAssets, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:TradeAndOtherCurrentPayables, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:NoncurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:NoncurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:OtherReserves, ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxAssets, ifrs-full:Assets All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -
